title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 §§ 635-16.2 - Qualifications for Providers of CSIDD
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 §§ 635-16.2 - Qualifications for Providers of CSIDD
State Regulations
(a) In order to provide CSIDD services, the
provider must: (1)
be certified by OPWDD, pursuant to section
16.03
(a)(5)
of the Mental Hygiene Law, to provide
CSIDD; (2)
be OPWDD or a
not-for-profit agency approved by OPWDD; (3)
enroll in the New York State Medicaid
program; (4)
have sufficient
professional staff to operate in their region; and
(5)
coordinate a network of providers to
ensure coordination of services for CSIDD recipients. Notes
